participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and warm-hearted, enjoys sharing experiences and bonding over interests.
participant_1.background: I live in Alabama. I've one brother. I like tacos. I have three sisters. I love dogs.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and generous, with a strong sense of duty and a passion for helping others.
participant_2.background: I work fulltime in a shipyard. I volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. My favorite color is navy blue. I'm ex military. I donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
